metadata.title: USN-6431-2 -- iperf3 vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6431-1 fixed a vulnerability in iperf3. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and Ubuntu 23.04.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that iperf3 did not properly manage certain inputs,   which could lead to a crash. A remote attacker could possibly use this  issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-38403)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6431-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  iperf3 - 3.12-1+deb12u1build0.23.04.1 libiperf0 - 3.12-1+deb12u1build0.23.04.1 libiperf-dev - 3.12-1+deb12u1build0.23.04.1 No subscription required
